{%- set symbol_currency = frappe.db.get_value("Currency", doc.currency, "symbol") -%} {%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- for tax in doc.taxes -%} {%- if tax.tax_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl. No Code Name Qty Unit Rate Amount Cost Center Project
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.item_code }} {{ row.item_name }} {% if row.item_name|trim != row.description|striptags %} {{ row.description }} {% endif %} {%- if row.brand_name -%}
{{ row.brand_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.model_name -%}
{{ row.model_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if row.notes -%}
({{ row.notes }}) {%- endif -%} 		{{ frappe.format_value(row.qty,{"fieldtype":"Float"})}} {{ row.uom }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(row.rate, currency=symbol_currency) }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(row.amount, currency=symbol_currency) }} {{ row.cost_center }} {%if frappe.db.get_value('Project',{'name':row.project},['project_name'])!=None %} {{frappe.db.get_value('Project',{'name':row.project},['project_name'])}} {% endif %}
Discount {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.discount_amount * -1, currency=symbol_currency ) }}
{{ tax.title }} {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(tax.tax_amount, currency=symbol_currency) }}
Total {{ frappe.utils.fmt_money(doc.grand_total, currency=symbol_currency) }}
In Words: {{ frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.grand_total, doc.currency) }}

Purchase Terms & Conditions:
